text: Nyiko Floyd Shivambu (born 1 January 1983) is a South African politician. He is serving as a member of parliament for the Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF). == Career == Shivambu began his political career as a Student Representative Council President for University of Witwatersrand in 2004. == References == Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:South African MPs
title: Floyd Shivambu
